familyMemberEthics.description: Former trustee of The Donald J. Trump Grantor Trust. In Pres. Trump's 2017 financial disclosure, it was clarified that Pres. Trump is the Trustee Successor, and Donald Trump Jr. is the Trustee. Its current activity status and control structures are not reported.
familyMemberEthics.business: The Donald J. Trump Grantor Trust
